explanation: [0-0] A young woman with long straight hair stands on a stage, wearing a white shirt and black leather skirt. Holding a microphone, she smiles and looks ahead, with a background of black and green checkered walls.

Then the camera zooms in on the woman in the white shirt, she smiles and talks, then shakes her head slightly. Then the screen switches to a woman with short, shoulder-length hair. She is wearing a pink shirt and sitting on a chair, extending her right hand and talking.
